Argument Parser

class dj_kaos_utils.argparse.ArgParseTypes

Bases: ArgParseTypes

Contains static methods that can be passed to argparse.ArgumentParser().add_argument(type=) Adds on top of py_kaos_utils.argparse.ArgParseTypes types specific to Django.

static tz_aware_datetime(s)

Return a timezone aware datetime parsed from a cli argument.
